{"id":620528848,"lang":"java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1642284531,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/620528848/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"39.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String makeGood(String s) {\n        Stack<Character> stack = new Stack<>();\n        for (char c : s.toCharArray()) {\n            if (!stack.isEmpty() && Math.abs(stack.peek() - c) == 32) {\n                stack.pop();\n            } else {\n                stack.push(c);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        for (char c : stack) {\n            sb.append(c);\n        }\n        return sb.toString();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great"}
